newsitem.title: MEXICO: Mexico stocks soar at close, surpass 3,400 pts.
newsitem.headline: Mexico stocks soar at close, surpass 3,400 pts.

text.p: Mexican stocks soared near the close of Tuesday's trading session, overtaking resistance at 3,400 points on their way to a new record close.
The IPC index of blue-chip stocks was up 77.12 points or 2.32 percent to 3,401.79 at the close of trade, although the final total had yet to calculated.
On Friday the bolsa index set a record close of 3,361.39 points.
